text: The current Promoters are Mustafa Esmail Kapasi and Kumarshri Rajkumar Bahety. As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Promoters hold 1,34,09,995 Equity Shares, which constitutes 95% of the issued, subscribed, and paid-up Equity Share Capital of our Company.
